Body:
I am trying to create a service that consumes data from different cloud providers and it should be able to support adding new providers at runtime. To be specific, trying to build to something like this : https://my.artik.cloud/devices

A cloud platform to integrate with various device types. The minimum requirement is able to add new device integration without changing the code. Any pointers on how to achieve this ?

"

The best way from Spring Integration perspective is Dynamic Integration Flow Registrations and recently fixed mechanism to register REST endpoints at runtime: https://jira.spring.io/browse/INT-4436

So
column9: right: this is not possible right now
column10:
but it is going to be as a feature in the next 5.1 version.

"

Body: Is there any other workaround for this ?

Well, workaround is to copy/paste an `IntegrationRequestMappingHandlerMapping` from `5.1` to your own project and register it as a `HttpContextUtils.HANDLER_MAPPING_BEAN_NAME` bean. This way your one will have a precedence over one registered by Framework.
